alert.note: Alert for John Day Basin; Ochoco-John Day Highlands (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 4:17AM PST until January 19 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...John Day Basin and Ochoco-John Day Highlands. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 1 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixed wintry precipitation including freezing rain is expected along a northwest-oriented line in the western portion of the John Day Basin, including Mitchell and Monument. Rain is forecast east towards Dayville and John Day.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel.

area.areaDesc: John Day Basin; Ochoco-John Day Highlands
